text: Giovanni Spadolini (21 June 1925 - 4 August 1994) was a Republican Italian politician. He was the 44th Prime Minister of Italy from 1981 through 1982 and the acting President of Italy in 1992. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Presidents of Italy Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Florence Category:Presidents of the Italian Senate
title: Giovanni Spadolini
